name: OnPlayerEnterCheckpoint
notes: This callback can also be called by NPC.
description: This callback is called when a player enters the checkpoint set for that player.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The player who entered the checkpoint.

return_values: It is always called first in filterscripts.
related_fn:
